name: A Roguelike Devil
description:
Description

Play as the devil in this endless, top-down, action roguelike. Gather experience, choose upgrades carefully, and defeat Hell's intruders! Every 5 levels you can choose a relic, an upgrade at times so powerful, that you have to sacrifice your health!

Controls

Left Mouse Click: Shoot a fireball in the direction of the cursor.

Right Mouse Click: Swing your trident in the direction of the cursor.

Escape: Pauses the game.
